name: GRUFF
description:
GRUFF a game by Cunnah.

Help Gruff get to the tallest places with running, jumping, and wall hopping!

Sadly this is incomplete due to last minuet bugs but you get to see what was intended at the core game play. Level is complete including tutorial and ending (of a sorts). ENJOY!

All textures, models, animations, and code was done by Cunnah for the Jam.

Controls are WASD or ARROW KEYS. SPACE to jump. 

Press E next to signs for useful advice!
